METADATA.TITLE: Next.js Starter
METADATA.DESCRIPTION: A modern Next.js starter template with internationalization support

ERROR.TITLE: Something went wrong
ERROR.DESCRIPTION: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again or contact support if the problem persists.

GLOBAL_ERROR.TITLE: Application Error
GLOBAL_ERROR.DESCRIPTION: A critical error occurred in the application. Please refresh the page or contact support.

NOT_FOUND.HEADING: Page Not Found
NOT_FOUND.DESCRIPTION: The page you are looking for does not exist or has been moved.

HOME.TITLE: Welcome to Next.js Starter
HOME.DESCRIPTION: A production-ready starter template with TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and comprehensive tooling.
HOME.FEATURE_1: Next.js 16 with App Router and React Server Components
HOME.FEATURE_2: TypeScript with strict mode and additional safety checks
HOME.FEATURE_3: Tailwind CSS v4 with dark mode support

ABOUT.TITLE: About
ABOUT.SUBTITLE: Learn more about this starter template
